message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I believe it's worth a lot, so I'm starting the price at $20,000. What do you think?
Alice, $20,000 is a bit steep for me.  I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only able to go up to $15,000 right now.  What do you think?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $20,000 is my ideal price, I'm willing to come down to $18,000 for a quick sale. This product is truly valuable, and I believe you'll benefit greatly from it.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down to $18,000, but I'm still a bit out of my budget.  I'm confident we can find a middle ground.  I'm willing to go up to $16,000.  Let's see if we can make this work.
